title: Value of a definite integral from a Riemann sum

content.prompt: For a certain continuous function f, the right Riemann sum approximation of  ∫ 0 2 f ( x )   d x MathType@MTEF@5@5@@433A@ with n subintervals of equal length is 2 ( n + 1 ) ( 3 n + 2 ) n 2 MathType@MTEF@5@5@@454E@ for all n. What is the value of ∫ 0 2 f ( x )   d x MathType@MTEF@5@5@@433A@ ?

topic.text: 6.3: Riemann Sums, Summation Notation, and Definite Integral Notation

skill.text: Skill 2.C: Identify a re-expression of mathematical information presented in a given representation
